name: MONKE SIMULATOR (V1.1.0)
description:
OUT NOW!

Collect Bananas As Stinky Poop And Grow Bigger! Keep A Little Bit Of Your New Size On Every Level Slowly Getter Permanently Bigger And Bigger Throughout 5 Levels. Pick Up The Rare Blue Banana And Grow 5x Your Current Size!!

-YOU WILL NEED GAMEMAKER STUDIO 2 TO PLAY THIS GAME-
